SELECT FILE_ID AS fileId ,file_Version AS fileVersion ,file_nm AS fileNm ,FILE_SIZE AS fileSize ,file_hash as fileHash ,file_download_path as fileDownloadPath ,DATE_FORMAT(fcft.REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS regDate ,fcft.REG_ID AS regId ,fcft.MOD_ID AS modId ,DATE_FORMAT(fcft.MOD_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS modDate ,sat.admin_nm AS adminNm ,ip_address as ipAddress FROM fim_client_file_tb fcft LEFT JOIN sim_admin_tb sat ON fcft.reg_id = sat.login_id
WHERE FILE_ID = #{fileId}
